vision_mission.vision: To be a global leader in advancing Artificial Intelligence and Cyber Security, empowering an intelligent, secure, and future-ready digital world.
mission: Leading the development of competent talent in the fields of Artificial Intelligence and Cybersecurity to shape human capital and a secure, intelligent digital future.
Pioneering Innovation in Artificial Intelligence and Cyber Security through strategic collaboration.
Advancing Artificial Intelligence and Cyber Security solutions that are ethical, inclusive, industry-oriented and societal well-being.
objectives: To produce graduates who are competent, globally competitive, creative, and innovative in Artificial Intelligence and Cyber Security, capable of addressing future technological and industrial challenges.
To enhance research, innovation, and commercialisation in Artificial Intelligence and Cyber Security with strategic and integrated approach, to social well-being and technological sustainability.
To foster strong moral, leadership and ethics values among students holistically.
To strengthen smart infrastructure, digital systems, financial governance, and a high-performance work culture that supports sustainability of the faculty.
To uphold the faculty as a globally recognised institution through internationalisation, strategic collaborations, and excellence in academic and research.
